column2: Pyruvate + 1 Acetyl CoA + 1 ATP + 1 HCO3 → 2-Oxoglutarate + 1 CO2 + 1 NADH
L-2-Aminoadipate + NADPH + H2 + ATP → L-2-Aminoadipate 6-semialdehyde + NADP+ + AMP + Diphosphate
L-Glutamate + L-2-Aminoadipate 6-semialdehyde + NADPH + H2 → Saccharopine + NADP+ + H2O
Saccharopine + NAD+ + H2O → L-Lysine + 2-Oxoglutarate + NADH + H2
